metadata.title: CVE-2019-13106 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: Das U-Boot versions 2016.09 through 2019.07-rc4 can memset() too much data while reading a crafted ext4 filesystem, which results in a stack buffer overflow and likely code execution.

criterions.comment: u-boot package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2020.04+dfsg-2ubuntu1').
